releaseNotes: Celebration Bug Fixes & UI Improvements - Fixed celebration fireworks positioning to display across entire screen instead of just bottom - Fixed random celebration to select new type every time tasks are completed instead of once - Enhanced balloon movement with better horizontal travel and natural swaying effects - Improved fireworks visibility with larger size and glow effects - Added more fireworks and increased frequency for better visual impact - Enhanced balloon physics with wind effects and screen boundary handling - Improved celebration animations for better user experience - Fixed celebration type selection logic for random mode
